name: The Absorber: Black water
description:
Welcome to Black water!

You will play as an Absorber who has been sent by his guild to resolve a quest.

In the game you need to defeat 3 bosses but the last one need to be called by a special artefact.

Comprehend the colors to understand the enemies' pattern, use your items wisely, absorb powers from the shrines and makeshift your own way to finish the game.

This game was made for the game jam called "Boss Rush Jam 2023"

Hope you gonna like the game :)

Credits:
